channel.title: Proxies like HotSpot Shield; except for Australian servers?
channel.description: Hey guys, I usually use HotSpot Shield if I need to do something anonymously, but it goes through an American server and I usually suffer terrible lag. I was wondering if anyone knows a program like it, except it uses Australian proxies?

item.title: Proxies like HotSpot Shield; except for Australian servers?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Huh. Well, I’ll check it out then.

Read full topic

item.title: Proxies like HotSpot Shield; except for Australian servers?
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:7, topic:322493”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=418892.msg3080216#msg3080216 date=1262109027]
i take it you missed the tor part
[/quote]
I thought Tor used American servers… atleast that’s what I got told.[/quote]Tor lets you switch your “server” at a click, and your traffic is routed through a new “server” anywhere in the world.
